subscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
subscriptionId.description: Azure Subscription Id in which migrate project was created.

resourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupName.description: Name of the Azure Resource Group that migrate project is part of.

migrateProjectName.name: migrateProjectName
migrateProjectName.description: Name of the Azure Migrate project.

machineName.name: machineName
machineName.description: Unique name of a machine in Azure migration hub.

databaseName.name: databaseName
databaseName.description: Unique name of a database in Azure migration hub.

databaseInstanceName.name: databaseInstanceName
databaseInstanceName.description: Unique name of a database instance in Azure migration hub.

solutionName.name: solutionName
solutionName.description: Unique name of a migration solution within a migrate project.

eventName.name: eventName
eventName.description: Unique name of an event within a migrate project.

pageSize.name: pageSize
pageSize.description: The number of items to be returned in a single page. This value is honored only if it is less than the 100.

api-version.name: api-version
api-version.description: Standard request header. Used by service to identify API version used by client.

acceptLanguage.description: Standard request header. Used by service to respond to client in appropriate language.
acceptLanguage.name: Accept-Language

get.summary: Gets a list of database instances in the migrate project.
Gets a database instance in the migrate project.
Gets a list of databases in the migrate project.
Gets a database in the migrate project.
Gets a list of events in the migrate project.
Gets an event in the migrate project.

delete.description: Delete the migrate event. Deleting non-existent migrate event is a no-operation.

get.summary: Gets a list of machines in the migrate project.
Gets a machine in the migrate project.
Method to get a migrate project.

put.summary: Method to create or update a migrate project.

patch.description: Update a migrate project with specified name. Supports partial updates, for example only tags can be provided.

delete.description: Delete the migrate project. Deleting non-existent project is a no-operation.

post.summary: Registers a tool with the migrate project.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Input containing the name of the tool to be registered.

post.summary: Refresh the summary of the migrate project.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: The goal input which needs to be refreshed.

get.summary: Gets a solution in the migrate project.

put.summary: Creates a solution in the migrate project.

patch.description: Update a solution with specified name. Supports partial updates, for example only tags can be provided.

delete.description: Delete the solution. Deleting non-existent project is a no-operation.

get.summary: Gets the list of solutions in the migrate project.

post.summary: Gets the config for the solution in the migrate project.
Cleanup the solution data in the migrate project.

get.summary: Get list of operations supported in the API.
